detectors.description:
Sale.releaseHeldCoins() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Sale.sol#115-125) uses a Boolean constant improperly:
	-require(bool)(! isFunding) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Sale.sol#118)

Sale.releaseHeldCoins() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Sale.sol#115-125) contains a tautology or contradiction:
	- require(bool)(held >= 0) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Sale.sol#119)
Sale.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Sale.sol#58-69) ignores return value by Token.mintToken(msg.sender,amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Sale.sol#67)
Sale.contribute() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Sale.sol#71-82) ignores return value by Token.mintToken(msg.sender,amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Sale.sol#80)
Sale.releaseHeldCoins() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Sale.sol#115-125) ignores return value by Token.mintToken(msg.sender,held) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Sale.sol#123)

Sale.createHoldToken(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Sale.sol#108-113) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- heldTokens[_to] = amount (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Sale.sol#109)
	- heldTimeline[_to] = block.number + 0 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Sale.sol#110)
